name: Space Walk (Azure Games)
description:
Fix your ship and escape from the monster that seeks to turn you into it's space meal. Keep an eye on your oxygen tank, and refill it at the oxygenator located at the bottom of the ship. 

Your astronaut will automatically repair broken sections when they are within range.

Use your tether hook to swing from one part of your ship to the next. Your thrusters can help you with some more fine movement, and add momentum to your swings.

Controls:
LMB- Shoot tether hook. Release let's go of tether.

WASD- Thrusts you in respective direction. There is a short cooldown on this so use it well.
